metadata.description: Claude Code skills and hooks collection - session management, git worktree operations, and more

plugins.name: session-skills
plugins.description: Provides session-closure, session-resume, and session-cleanup skills for maintaining context across Claude Code sessions. Automatically creates session resumes with project status, sync tracking, and intelligent archiving.

plugins.name: git-worktree
plugins.description: Interactive git worktree management. Clone repos into worktree form, convert existing repos, create/list/remove worktrees, and troubleshoot issues. Uses WORKTREES/GITHUB/{owner}/{repo}/ workspace structure.

plugins.name: context-monitor
plugins.description: Always-visible statusline showing context usage percentage with color thresholds. Shows [Model] XX% even when Claude's built-in indicator is hidden. Manual installation required - see tools/context-monitor/README.md.

plugins.name: git-enforcement-hooks
plugins.description: Git workflow enforcement hooks. Requires -S -s flags on commits, blocks Claude attribution, enforces separate git add/commit workflow. Python 3.9+ compatible. Manual installation to ~/.claude/hooks/ required.
